A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This was the worst of the Star Wars Franchise since The Phantom Menace (and I didn't mind that when it first came out\, only started to dislike it after the other prequels were released). 

But after Force Awakens came out it restored my faith in the moviemakers\, it was a movie that was a nod to the Original (and Holy) Trinity before it.

So I had high hopes for The Last Jedi\, but from the outset...corny one liner jokes\, disappointing plotlines and what was up with the porgs?!? 

And unfortunately\, Star Wars has succumbed to the pressure and been Disney-ised...

I have only one thing left to say...

Help Us J.J. Abrams\, You're Our Only Hope...!! (Hopefully Episode IX will our saving grace\, or else and I hate to say it... I'm done with Star Wars).
